title: Create a Virtual Tour for a Listing
description: To enhance marketing, a listing agent arranges for a 3D virtual tour of a property.

tasks.description: Schedule a 3D photographer (e.g., Matterport provider) to scan the property.
Receive the completed virtual tour link from the photographer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains the final virtual tour URL.

tasks.description: Add the virtual tour link to the MLS listing and share it on social media.
tasks.expected_outcome: The virtual tour is successfully integrated into the property's marketing materials.
